businessProfile.name: Signature Pizza And Salads Ltd.
businessProfile.address: 5120 Roblin Blvd, Winnipeg, MB R3R 0G9, Canada
businessProfile.formatted_address: 5120 Roblin Blvd, Winnipeg, MB R3R 0G9, Canada

reviews.text: Excellent pizza have had it a few times. Great taste and toppings. Will be back for sure. Friendly counter staff.

I ordered a medium Signature pizza, with extra cheese. The crust had good chew, with a great texture. They use a sweeter sauce, where my preferred flavour is more spice. The toppings taste fresh, but extra cheese is usually required. Seems a bit expensive relative to other great pizza joints around Winnipeg. The staff are friendly, and the service is good.
I need good food I can eat due to long term Crohn‚Äôs & my daughter has allergies, THIS IS 1000% WONDERFUL!!! Not 1-complaint & we are very hard to feed!!!!

Signature Pizza & Salads is my favourite in the city. Delicious! The food is prepared so fast, yet wonderful! But I‚Äôm equally impressed with the staff who are always so kind, so cheerful, and just completely nice!

Good location. Dedicated parking in that small mall. food is good.i visit lots of places in city especially pizza stores. I found this place to be neat.If they could add more to customer service skills it will be one of the best store in city. i gave the feedback few weeks ago but i don't see any follow up on that. i found this to be little not too professional. person like me or one visits your business, take time to write about your business. in return you have blank response like no response at all. that means you don't care about google business feedback. i also waited for response for enough weeks or months so you can't say you never got a time or you were busy.perfect example how you could loose points for not caring.we can't leave customer service out of our business model.

recentReviews.text: Signature Pizza & Salads is my favourite in the city. Delicious! The food is prepared so fast, yet wonderful! But I‚Äôm equally impressed with the staff who are always so kind, so cheerful, and just completely nice!
One of the best pizzas in the city, the garlic sticks are killer
Never disappointed! Salad, bread sticks and Texas are always the go to!
Too bad, they changed their cheese to probably keep their prices lower. Once was the best pizza in Charlsewood.
I need good food I can eat due to long term Crohn‚Äôs & my daughter has allergies, THIS IS 1000% WONDERFUL!!! Not 1-complaint & we are very hard to feed!!!!
Excellent pizza have had it a few times. Great taste and toppings. Will be back for sure. Friendly counter staff.
We ordered two medium pizzas. The crust was extra crispy and burnt along the outside the edge. Considering we paid over $50 it was very disappointing. Where is the quality control?
I love their pizza.  Best pizza

detailedReviews.author: Theresa
detailedReviews.text: Signature Pizza & Salads is my favourite in the city. Delicious! The food is prepared so fast, yet wonderful! But I‚Äôm equally impressed with the staff who are always so kind, so cheerful, and just completely nice!

detailedReviews.author: Brad Nickel
detailedReviews.text: One of the best pizzas in the city, the garlic sticks are killer

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Hurd
detailedReviews.text: Never disappointed! Salad, bread sticks and Texas are always the go to!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Amborsky
detailedReviews.text: Too bad, they changed their cheese to probably keep their prices lower. Once was the best pizza in Charlsewood.

detailedReviews.author: Jane Porter
detailedReviews.text: I need good food I can eat due to long term Crohn‚Äôs & my daughter has allergies, THIS IS 1000% WONDERFUL!!! Not 1-complaint & we are very hard to feed!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Rich
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza have had it a few times. Great taste and toppings. Will be back for sure. Friendly counter staff.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley H
detailedReviews.text: We ordered two medium pizzas. The crust was extra crispy and burnt along the outside the edge. Considering we paid over $50 it was very disappointing. Where is the quality control?

detailedReviews.author: Robert L
detailedReviews.text: I love their pizza.  Best pizza

detailedReviews.author: C Jacobson (CJ)
detailedReviews.text: The service was fast and the pizza is really good! Just grabbed a small pepperoni, it really hit the spot

detailedReviews.author: Amandeep Brar
detailedReviews.text: Meats on pizza were really of great quality and super tasty. Great crust and sauce

detailedReviews.author: Joel Simard
detailedReviews.text: First time trying signature pizza, And I gotta say that everything about it screams quality. From the crust to the fresh sauce, all the toppings and ingredients. Exactly what I want in a pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Piper A
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the Charleswood area. I get the Bread sticks with the Dairy-Free garlic butter on them and they are drool worthy! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Chad Michael
detailedReviews.text: Had my first "Signature" experience today and it was incredible. One of my new favorite Pizza's in Winnipeg, can't wait to try all the different Pizza options on the Menu here. Love supporting local owners and this place has a great one!

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa A
detailedReviews.text:
This is my favourite pizza in Manitoba, the dill pickle pizza and Signature salad is our go to currently.

I love supporting a family owned business who makes their dough fresh daily, and all their deli meats are Winnipeg Old Country.

The trip for us to get here is 87km and it is worth it every time!

detailedReviews.author: The Pegger
detailedReviews.text: Having our kitchen floor tiled and the range/oven was disconnected.  Normally go to a "tried and true" place on Portage but the bridge was under construction so I wanted something on the south side of the river.  Had been to the other restaurant next door often and seen the sign so though I would try their takeout.  Both the chicken pizza and the greek salad were exceptionally good.  There's an international chain down the street a bit as well as a couple of local chains close by.  Don't bother with any of them, this is THE place to order from, hands down.

detailedReviews.author: K M
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is amazing every time we order, and the bread sticks are #1. Staff is always friendly & delivery staff are always wonderful! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: justin osadac
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, quick to pick up!

detailedReviews.author: Ms. Mandy
detailedReviews.text: Had the signature salad and a asiago chicken pizza. Delivery was quick and food was exactly as ordered and so very tasty - worth every dollar!

detailedReviews.author: Miles Reid
detailedReviews.text: Love the salad and bread sticks.  Much better then a similar salad offered at another restaurant near by.... several years later this place is still killing it.  Great pizza great salad.   I will always be back.

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Grewar
detailedReviews.text: Great food and great value

detailedReviews.author: Saul Standoff
detailedReviews.text: Just moved to the area and saw this little slice of heaven (see what I did there) tucked into a back corner. Decided to try it last night..  the most friendly staff and the best pizza I've ever had in the city. Amazing crust, not covered in grease, tons of toppings. Ceaser salad was top notch and the cheese bread. My only complaint is it has ruined all other pizza places for me. 200/10 will be ordering again.

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Morin
detailedReviews.text: They aren‚Äôt capable of taking accurate orders and don‚Äôt make it right after.

detailedReviews.author: Rowin
detailedReviews.text:
Saturday, September 9th 2023 at 7:25pm

The gentleman with the cap and glasses was incredibly polite, prompt and professional towards me.

Thank you very much and keep up the amazing work!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Bruce
detailedReviews.text: I love the pizza from signature, it's reasonably priced and delicious. It's locally owned not a chain and they are consistent with their recipe. I highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Beverley
detailedReviews.text: I love Signature. I order almost every Friday! I usually order on door dash or pick it up after I‚Äôm done work. I‚Äôm just really sad to see that you don‚Äôt deliver to my area anymore. Signature salad and bruschetta sticks every time. I guess I‚Äôll have to do more driving!

detailedReviews.author: Darryl Fahlman
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza, great amount of toppings, always fresh.  Price is a bit higher than the regular pizza places but we‚Äôll worth the extra 10$

detailedReviews.author: Frey Banman
detailedReviews.text: Hands down the best gluten/dairy free pizza I have tasted to date. Excellent service!

detailedReviews.author: laura hlushko
detailedReviews.text: Ordered 3 medium pizzas for a group of friends xmas gathering and all were terrible.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Copenace
detailedReviews.text: kinda below average, this is one of those not great but it'll do type pizzas.

detailedReviews.author: Ashleigh Kelman
detailedReviews.text: Not as good as we had before. Expected better for the price.

detailedReviews.author: Mario Sacco
detailedReviews.text: Great Signature Salad

detailedReviews.author: rkn
detailedReviews.text:
Ok pizza. Not disgusting anyway. Flavorless and uninspiring sauce. Crust is form yet chewie. They do a good job of not making it soggy bit it's also flavorless. Meats seem run-of-the-mill. Is it worth the premium cost? Probably not.
Also tried gluten free vegan cheese pizza. Gluten free pizza isn't as good as what is available from frozen section of grocery store. Really wanted to love this place because it's so close. Just can't.

detailedReviews.author: Justin hunstad
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza. I'm not in the area too often but when I am, its visiting my parents and we will always order from here.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Kilborn
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and service

detailedReviews.author: Relax with Aay
detailedReviews.text: Good location. Dedicated parking in that small mall. food is good.i visit lots of places in city especially pizza stores. I found this place to be neat.If they could add more to customer service skills it will be one of the best store in city. i gave the feedback few weeks ago but i don't see any follow up on that. i found this to be little not too professional. person like me or one visits your business, take time to write about your business. in return you have blank response like no response at all. that means you don't care about google business feedback. i also waited for response for enough weeks or months so you can't say you never got a time or you were busy.perfect example how you could loose points for not caring.we can't leave customer service out of our business model.

detailedReviews.author: Tee Bee
detailedReviews.text:
Our family‚Äôs go to for pizza and salad.
Sometimes it‚Äôs a bit of a wait on busy nights, but it always shows up hot and fresh. The wait is worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Aldan Wherrett
detailedReviews.text: Anyone else notice they switched the salad containers to paper and their salad if awful now? Soakes all the dressing into the paper and makes a soggy container. Way to go used to be great

detailedReviews.author: Alan Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: Decided to try this place for the first time tonight. Absolutely hands down best pizza we've had in a long time. Garlic sticks were out of this world.

detailedReviews.author: Corey Popko
detailedReviews.text: Great food and great service

detailedReviews.author: Quinn Grose
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely horrendous customer service

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Nordick
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a medium Signature pizza, with extra cheese. The crust had good chew, with a great texture. They use a sweeter sauce, where my preferred flavour is more spice. The toppings taste fresh, but extra cheese is usually required. Seems a bit expensive relative to other great pizza joints around Winnipeg. The staff are friendly, and the service is good.

detailedReviews.author: Shaun Wiebe
detailedReviews.text: Staff is fabulous.  Pizzas and salads are amazing. Signature pizza is the go to in our house. Always buy the biggest pizza to make sure there are leftovers of lunch for the week.

detailedReviews.author: John (COMIC GUY)
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic everytime we order from them.  I love the Canadian Pizza ,give it a shot if you love meat on your pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Russell
detailedReviews.text: The Gourmet Veggie pizza is the best in the city. So well balanced and flavourful.  Service is always great. Nice business.

detailedReviews.author: Lucian Sweet
detailedReviews.text:
Just went for the first time recently after seeing the good reviews.
They did not disappoint one bit, everyone loved the pizza! The service is good and location looks very clean. I will be happy to return to try some their other pizzas in the future.
Keep up the good work Signature Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: James Brown
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is terrible, it would be on the same level as Pizza Pizza or Dominos at best. If you are looking for a quality pizza look somewhere else. I gave it 2 stars due to the fact the order process was easy and did not have to wait on hold long, and also the staff is very friendly and helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Ted Gulay
detailedReviews.text: Decided to try Signature Pizza tonight for the first time. Wanted some place different instead of the usual places that we normally go to. Nothing but amazing, it was done perfectly. Many Pizzas to choose from. Our's was their Signature Pizza..

detailedReviews.author: E M
detailedReviews.text: Consistant, fast and great pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Dean Michael
detailedReviews.text: Great food!  fresh ingredients, ample serving sizes, quick friendly service, and it all tastes GREAT.  We've ordered from them several times and have never been disappointed.  The menu is simple and they serve what they say they serve - pizza and salads.  If this is what's for dinner, you can't go wrong.

detailedReviews.author: DC LANDSCAPING
detailedReviews.text: Great za!!

detailedReviews.author: Urban Empire Landscape
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Maria R
detailedReviews.text: We've ordered from Signature Pizza a few times. The pizza is delicious and not greasy.  This is our new favorite pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Gord Doerksen
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Lougheed
detailedReviews.text: Said it would be 45 mins or less, showed up 1hr15mins. Only a 7 mins drive from the restaurant, pizza was like warm & generic at best. I'll order from 222 for better pizza next time.

detailedReviews.author: S M
detailedReviews.text: Enjoyed our pizza

detailedReviews.author: Shaker M
detailedReviews.text: Ordered the Mexican and the Texan. Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Wanlee Inthirath
detailedReviews.text: the pizza is amazing and the price is excellent

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Deslauriers
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Pappas
detailedReviews.text: Second time ordering and it was great. First time we ordered the signature pizza which was outstanding. This time we used a two large two topping pizza, bread sticks and salad coupon. Pizza was great but the bread sticks would have been better with marinara or garlic butter. But can't complain at all.

detailedReviews.author: MD
detailedReviews.text: friendly staff, great pizzas!

detailedReviews.author: Kyle S
detailedReviews.text: 100% legit fresh ingredients amazing crust overall incredible pizza this place is the bomb thanks for the amazing pizza jon and rob keep doing whatever it is your doing to make such incredible pizza üëåüëåüëå

detailedReviews.author: Makayla Peters
detailedReviews.text:
Tonight was my first time trying signature pizza and wow was it amazing!
I would highly recommend this place to anyone,anywhere,anytime. You can tell they use high quality fresh ingredients. Will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Flett
detailedReviews.text: Very impressed with quick and very courteous service

detailedReviews.author: lazydaisy0413
detailedReviews.text: Had the Signature Salad with bread twists.  Both were extra yummy.  Will definitely be back for more.

detailedReviews.author: Sheri Glendinning
detailedReviews.text: I ordered the deluxe pizza. It arrived quickly and was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: H L
detailedReviews.text: Ordered the Signature and the Meat Eater pizza and they were both excellent. Top quality pizza at an excellent price!

detailedReviews.author: Graham Hawryluk
detailedReviews.text: Just took home a Texas Pizza and Vegetarian Pizza.  Very delicious!  The gentleman running the store front was very personable and friendly.  I will definitely be ordering from Signature again.

detailedReviews.author: Vince Turner
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around !!   Super nice service and speedy delivery ,  I recommend this pizza place to everyone.

detailedReviews.author: Betty Mcmahon
detailedReviews.text: No need to go anywhere else for Pizza or/and salads.  What an amazing place.  The Pizza was delicious, in no way greasy like most other well-known Pizza Restaurants and toppings loaded to the edge.  The salad is to die for.  You even get bread sticks and the prices are excellant.  Can't say enough about this restaurant I would give it 10 stars!. Very clean too.

detailedReviews.author: krie2
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Liam Higgins
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza, friendly stall and perfect service. Will definitely go again and recommend to everyone!!!!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the speed of service, noting that the food is prepared quickly without compromising on quality. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The quality and taste of the pizza, including the fresh dough and high-quality toppings, are frequently highlighted by customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The friendly and cheerful staff create a welcoming atmosphere that customers appreciate. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding quality control and customer service - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and competition with other pizza places - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.text: Signature Pizza & Salads is my favourite in the city. Delicious! The food is prepared so fast, yet wonderful! But I‚Äôm equally impressed with the staff who are always so kind, so cheerful, and just completely nice!

positive.author: Brad Nickel
positive.text: One of the best pizzas in the city, the garlic sticks are killer

positive.author: Alyssa Hurd
positive.text: Never disappointed! Salad, bread sticks and Texas are always the go to!

Also tried gluten free vegan cheese pizza. Gluten free pizza isn't as good as what is available from frozen section of grocery store. Really wanted to love this place because it's so close. Just can't.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
